name: Do A Flip
description:
Go ahead and flip in this simple parkour based game! To progress through the level, help yourself to the power ups. The illusion power up will help you see new parts of the course, and will allow you to run into the bizarre power up. A power up responsible for an upside down experience.

Controls-

W A S D: Move

Spacebar: Jump

Spacebar (twice): Double Jump

(Hold) Shift or Left Control: Sprint

Left Mouse Click: Front Flip (when mid-air)

Right Mouse Click: Back Flip (mid-air)

Escape: Exit the application

Advanced //

(Scroll) Mouse Wheel Down: Side Flip (when mid-air and moving left/right)
